sections.heading: Prisoner; examination; deposition; production order
sections.text: (1) A person confined in any prison in this state shall, by order of any court of record, be produced for oral examination in the county where he or she is imprisoned. In all other cases his or her examination must be by deposition.(2) In civil mat

sections.heading: provides no basis for taxing to a defendant in a civil action the costs of transporting a plaintiff who is an incarcerated person and who must be transported pursuant to this section
sections.text: Jacob v. Schlichtman, 16 Neb. App. 783, 753 N.W.2d 361 (2008).
